title: Tagliarini with sea bass, squid, mussels, clams, brown shrimps, tomato and parsley
ingredients: 300g/10½oz small clams, cleaned (discard any clams that don't close tightly when firmly  tapped)
300g/10½oz mussels, cleaned and de-bearded (discard any mussels that don't close when firmly tapped)
2 x 220g/8oz sea bass fillets, skin removed, thinly sliced
250g/9oz squid (tentacles included), cleaned and finely sliced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
